GroupChat - 聊天组中的的私人聊天

支持服务端: CraftBukkit/Spigot/PaperSpigot 1.7-1.12
要求前置插件: Vault

特征
*创建和删除聊天组*邀请和踢出聊天组*离开聊天组*一个指令来查看聊天组信息*可译的信息（lang.yml）*可定制通知声音（config.yml）



命令
主命令: /groupchat
删除一个组: /groupchat delete  // 只有组的创建者才可用
从你的组踢出玩家: /groupchat kick [player]   // 只有组的创建者才可用
在组中发送一个信息: /g [message] 或 /groupchat say [message]
重载配置文件及语言文件: /groupchat reload



权限
groupchat.user - 允许使用除 /groupchat reload 外所有指令groupchat.admin - 使用 /groupchat reload 的权限

GroupChat - private chats for player groups

Supported: CraftBukkit/Spigot/PaperSpigot 1.7-1.12

Requirements: Vault

### Features ###
* Group creating & deleting
* Player inviting & kicking out
* Leaving group
* Group details in one command
* Translatable messages (lang.yml)
* Customizable sound notifications for messages (config.yml)

### Commands ###

Main command: /groupchat
Create group: /groupchat create [name] // only without spaces for now
Delete group: /groupchat delete // only for group leaders
Invite player to group: /groupchat invite [player]
Kick player from group: /groupchat kick [player]
Group details: /groupchat info
Send message to group: /g [message] OR /groupchat say [message]
Reload main config & lang file: /groupchat reload

### Permissions ###

groupchat.user - access to all commands except /groupchat reload
groupchat.admin - access to /groupchat reload
